about_the_game:
Set sail and embark on a thrilling adventure on a mysterious pirate island. Dive deep into an open world survival craft game where danger and wonder await at every corner.

Navigate through treacherous waters, explore hidden coves, and uncover the secrets of the island. Every inch of the pirate island is filled with tales waiting to be discovered.

Survival and Crafting

Salvage materials from shipwrecks, gather resources, and craft essential tools and weapons. Building your own pirate haven is crucial for survival against the elements and more.

The surrounding waters are teeming with exotic sea creatures. Cast your line and fish for sustenance, or dive beneath the waves to encounter the mysteries of the deep.

Brew potions and rum, not just for for celebration! Brew potent concoctions to keep your spirits high. But remember, moderation is key in these treacherous times.

Hidden Secrets

But beware, for the island isn't just about survival and treasure. It holds secrets as deep and vast as the ocean itself. Are you brave enough to uncover them?

short_description: Get ready for a pirate-themed open world survival game with modular base building, sunken island scavenging, crafting, exploring and getting treasures. Ready for the treasure hunter adventure?
